text: Wajinji mwa achinsyene itabu (Ayuda ni Akilisito) awele ali nkusachilila yanti ali am'buchisye (Asilamummwe) ku ukafili panyuma pakulupilila kwenu, ligongo lya litima lyakutyochela kwa wanganyao achimisyene, panyuma pakuonechela kwa jamanjao chakuona (jwali Muhammadi ï·º), basi mwakululuchilani nikwaleka mpaka Allah ayichenalyo lilamusi Lyakwe, chisimu Allah pa chindu chilichose awele Jwakombola
